value.description: Standard pattern Astartes power armour in the livery of the IV Legion, the Iron Warriors. Power armour worn by the Legiones Astartes is a sophisticated defensive system, combining huge resistance to physical damage along with integrated electro-motivated fibre bundles which augment the strength of the wearer.\n\nThe Iron Warriors are the grim-faced, cold-hearted masters of the science of war. More so than in any other Legion, the life of each warrior is secondary to his duty. Possibly the most relentless and dogged siege warriors in the ranks of the Legiones Astartes, the Iron Warriors have reduced countless fortresses to ashes throughout the Great Crusade.

Standard pattern Astartes power armour helmet in the livery of the IV Legion, the Iron Warriors. Completing a set of power armour, the helmet seals the wearer in a closed environment allowing for combat in the most extreme atmospheres. It also incorporates advanced targeting and sensory systems.\n\nThe Iron Warriors are the grim-faced, cold-hearted masters of the science of war. More so than in any other Legion, the life of each warrior is secondary to his duty. Possibly the most relentless and dogged siege warriors in the ranks of the Legiones Astartes, the Iron Warriors have reduced countless fortresses to ashes throughout the Great Crusade.

Assault pattern Astartes power armour in the livery of the IV Legion, the Iron Warriors. This armour incorporates a light and effective jump pack, allowing the wearer to quickly engage enemies across the battlefield.\n\nThe Iron Warriors are the grim-faced, cold-hearted masters of the science of war. More so than in any other Legion, the life of each warrior is secondary to his duty. Possibly the most relentless and dogged siege warriors in the ranks of the Legiones Astartes, the Iron Warriors have reduced countless fortresses to ashes throughout the Great Crusade.

Astartes Apothecarion pattern power armour in the livery of an Apothecary of the IV Legion, the Iron Warriors. Apothecaries carry a Legion's most sacred trusts: the care of its fallen and the promise of its future. They serve as battlefield healers in addition to being tasked with the recovery of the Legion's gene-seed from the fallen, and as such, the power armour worn by Legion Apothecaries is adapted for their role.\n\nThe Iron Warriors are the grim-faced, cold-hearted masters of the science of war. More so than in any other Legion, the life of each warrior is secondary to his duty. Possibly the most relentless and dogged siege warriors in the ranks of the Legiones Astartes, the Iron Warriors have reduced countless fortresses to ashes throughout the Great Crusade.

Astartes Apothecarion pattern power armour helmet in the livery of the IV Legion, the Iron Warriors. Completing an Apothecary's power armour, the helmet seals the wearer in a closed environment allowing for combat in the most extreme atmospheres. It's sensory systems are enhanced to assist the Apothecary's function of battlefield medicine and gene-seed recovery.\n\nThe Iron Warriors are the grim-faced, cold-hearted masters of the science of war. More so than in any other Legion, the life of each warrior is secondary to his duty. Possibly the most relentless and dogged siege warriors in the ranks of the Legiones Astartes, the Iron Warriors have reduced countless fortresses to ashes throughout the Great Crusade.

Astartes Armorum pattern power armour in the livery of a Techmarine of the IV Legion, the Iron Warriors. Techmarines are the masters of the Legion's Armorum, holding dual allegiances to both their legion and the Machine Cult of Mars. Their role on the battlefield is to operate and repair the most specialised and complex weaponry of the Legion, and their armour is modified to accommodate the cybernetic enhancements necessary to complete their function.\n\nThe Iron Warriors are the grim-faced, cold-hearted masters of the science of war. More so than in any other Legion, the life of each warrior is secondary to his duty. Possibly the most relentless and dogged siege warriors in the ranks of the Legiones Astartes, the Iron Warriors have reduced countless fortresses to ashes throughout the Great Crusade.

Astartes Armorum pattern power armour helmet in the livery of a Techmarine of the IV Legion, the Iron Warriors. Completing a Techmarine's power armour, the helmet seals the wearer in a closed environment allowing for combat in the most extreme atmospheres. It's sensory systems are enhanced for combat and to better interface with Servo-automata.\n\nThe Iron Warriors are the grim-faced, cold-hearted masters of the science of war. More so than in any other Legion, the life of each warrior is secondary to his duty. Possibly the most relentless and dogged siege warriors in the ranks of the Legiones Astartes, the Iron Warriors have reduced countless fortresses to ashes throughout the Great Crusade.

Astates tactical dreadnought Armour in the livery of the IV Legion, the Iron Warriors. Commonly called terminator armour, this armour is an advanced form of powered armour developed by blending dreadnought sarcophagi, standard power armour, and the heavy suits used by engineers working in the most hostile environments. The result is a level of protection far superior to power armour; but also an immense mass, causing a reduction in manoeuvrability and speed.\n\nThe Iron Warriors are the grim-faced, cold-hearted masters of the science of war. More so than in any other Legion, the life of each warrior is secondary to his duty. Possibly the most relentless and dogged siege warriors in the ranks of the Legiones Astartes, the Iron Warriors have reduced countless fortresses to ashes throughout the Great Crusade.

Astartes tactical dreadnought armour helmet in the livery of the IV Legion, the Iron Warriors. Completing a set of terminator armour, this helmet fully encloses the wearer and provides life-support functions, along with an array of sensors more advanced than those of standard power armour.\n\nThe Iron Warriors are the grim-faced, cold-hearted masters of the science of war. More so than in any other Legion, the life of each warrior is secondary to his duty. Possibly the most relentless and dogged siege warriors in the ranks of the Legiones Astartes, the Iron Warriors have reduced countless fortresses to ashes throughout the Great Crusade.

Perterabo's panoply of war, a unique and highly customised suit of Terminator armour of his own design known as the Logos.\n\nWeaned on war and intrigue in the strife-ridden courts of Olympia, Perturabo was a grim warrior and a master of technological arcana who wielded logic and the mathematics of warfare as keenly as he did a blade.

The Logos contained sophisticated command and control systems which linked Perturabo cybernetically to every facet of the forces under his disposal and a shifting array of weapons and secondary systems created by his own vast intellect.\n\nWeaned on war and intrigue in the strife-ridden courts of Olympia, Perturabo was a grim warrior and a master of technological arcana who wielded logic and the mathematics of warfare as keenly as he did a blade.
